parsers

Class ThroughDirectories

  • java.lang.Object
    • parsers.ThroughDirectories

  • public class ThroughDirectories
extends java.lang.Object
    Browses through the subfolders and files of the directory selected by the user and containing the kgml and text files. When a kgml file is encountered, a new instance of the Pathway class is created and the file is parsed. All the Pathway instances are stored into an ArrayList. The text files containing information about reactions and compounds are parsed when encountered, and the information are stored into hash tables.
    Author:
    Severine Liegeois
